To install the lpsolve file and its stuff please run mvn install:install-file -Dfile=CreMA/external/lpsolve55j.jar -DgroupId=net.sf.lpsolve -DartifactId=lp_solve -Dversion=5.5.2 -Dpackaging=jar mvn deploy:deploy-file -Dfile=lpsolve55j.jar \ -Durl=file:////Users/rcabanas/GoogleDrive/IDSIA/causality/dev/crema/target/mvn-repo \ -DgroupId=net.sf.lpsolve -DartifactId=lp_solve \ -Dversion=5.5.2 -Dpackaging=jar mvn install:install-file -Dfile=CreMA/external/polco.jar -DgroupId=ch.javasoft.polco -DartifactId=polco -Dversion=4.7.1 -Dpackaging=jar mvn deploy:deploy-file -Dfile=polco.jar \ -Durl=file:////Users/rcabanas/GoogleDrive/IDSIA/causality/dev/crema/target/mvn-repo \ -DgroupId=ch.javasoft -DartifactId=polco -Dversion=4.7.1 -Dpackaging=jar\ -Dpackaging=jar mvn org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-dependency-plugin:3.1.2:get \ -DgroupId=net.sf.lpsolve -DartifactId=lp_solve \ -Dversion=5.5.2 -Dpackaging=jar \ -DremoteRepositories=https://raw.github.com/idsia/crema/mvn-repo/ -repositoryUrl=https://raw.github.com/idsia/crema/mvn-repo/
